parameter.name: SampleAppEntities-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: SampleAppEntities Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: metadata=res://*/SampleApp.csdl|res://*/SampleApp.ssdl|res://*/SampleApp.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string="data source=JANKI-PC\SQLEXPRESS;initial catalog=SampleApp;persist security info=True;user id=sa;password=123456;MultipleActiveResultSets=True;App=EntityFramework"
